name: AI Code Next.js Starter
description: Next.js full-stack template optimized for AI-assisted development
mission: Through systematic optimization of architecture and data flow, save developers time, tokens and money
vision: Become the first choice for developers for Next.js full-stack development templates, making AI-assisted development more efficient and economical

values.title: AI-Friendly Architecture
values.description: Four-layer clear division of work, unified path aliases, smaller AI change scope, shorter context

values.title: Cost-First
values.description: From architecture to data flow, systematically reduce Token/request count/context length

values.title: Ready to Use
values.description: Core features like authentication, database, UI components are ready, focus on business logic

values.title: Open Source Sharing
values.description: Open source under Apache 2.0 license, welcoming community contributions and feedback

events.title: Project Initialization
events.description: Build basic architecture based on Next.js 15 and React 19

events.title: Core Features Development
events.description: Complete authentication system, database integration, UI component library

events.title: AI-Friendly Optimization
events.description: Implement four-layer architecture division, optimize path aliases and naming standards

events.title: v1.0 Official Release
events.description: Open source release, adopting Apache 2.0 protocol

events.title: Community Growth
events.description: GitHub Stars exceeded 1000, community contributors continue to increase

events.title: Feature Enhancement
events.description: Added blog system, user console and other core feature modules

pro.title: AI Code Next.js Starter Pro
pro.description: Unlock more enterprise-level features to accelerate your commercial project development
